Text:
thanks for the updated version, after I played this from here, I went out of my way to buy it. The devs are really great, Klei knows how to treat its audience.

plus you get like 4 copies. I gave the other two to a buddy of mine. best 11 dollars I've spent in a long time.
Wish I had 11 dollars to spend on this
15 Euro is about 61zl, which for me is like 60 euro for you, so don't write something is not expensive, when you don't know shit about 3rd world countries.

I only get these games because some games I love I can't play on my Mac, so I play them with  crossover, and wait until they release it on Mac later on...I also use this to test games to see if I'll like it and not waste my money
Hey kicksaw! 'The End is Nigh' is up m8, could you uploaded for us plz :D Thanks for your past uploads
